Definition: Logical model describing a basic patient encounter/consultation workflow generally implemented by the EMR/MRS technologies supported

Short: The subject of the medical consultation
Definition: The subject of the medical consultation

Recording of the consultation event which includes complaints of the patient, the practioner handling the encounter, the observations, the diagnoses, the treatment plan, and the outcome of the consultation
Purpose of consultation (e.g. check-up, follow-up, new health issue)

Short: Issues and complaints from the patient
Definition: Issues and complaints reported by the patient

Short: Procedures performed by the provider for assessment
Definition: Procedures performed by the provider to assess and diagnose the issue. Values typically selected from LOINC codes
Diagnosis of the issue. Values typically selected from SNOMED CT or ICD-10 codes
Describes whether the treatment was a success or not
